user.title: Setup your tedee locks
user.description: If you need help finding those settings check the [documentation](https://github.com/patrickhilker/tedee_hass_integration#Setup).

data.home_assistant_access_token: Home Assistant Long Lived Access Token (optional)

data_description.local_access_token: You can find it in the tedee app under "Bridge Settings" -> "Local API".
data_description.home_assistant_access_token: Used to allow bridge to push data to Home Assistant. You can find it in the Home Assistant UI under "Profile" -> "Long-Lived Access Tokens".

configure_cloud.title: Configure Cloud API
configure_cloud.description:
Enable fallback to cloud, in case local connection fails. [How to create Personal Access Token](https://tedee-tedee-api-doc.readthedocs-hosted.com/en/latest/howtos/authenticate.html#personal-access-key)  

Scopes:  
- Operate - Lock  
- Devices - Read

select_bridge.title: Select your bridge
select_bridge.description: Select the bridge you want to add to Home Assistant.

reauth_confirm.title: Update of Access Keys required
reauth_confirm.description: tedee needs an updated access key, because the existing one is invalid or might have expired.

error.bridge_not_found: No bridge found in cloud which matches the configured local bridge. Maybe you're using the wrong account?
